title: serviceabilityResponse
description: A response provided by an organization (Seller) to a Serviceability Request made by another organization (Buyer). This Serviceability Response is for a single location.

objectType.description: The type of the object, serviceabilityResponse.

status.description: The states used to convey Serviceability Request Status.
status.title: Status

projectId.description: An identifier that is used to group Orders that represent a unit of functionality that is important to a Buyer. A Project can be used to relate multiple Orders together.
projectId.title: Project Id

serviceabilityRequestId.description: The id of the associated Serviceability Request.
serviceabilityRequestId.title: Serviceability Request

buyerId.description: A Party Role played by an Individual or an Organization that buys products and services from a Seller. Specifically, the ID of the Service Provider (Buyer) organization placing the serviceability request.
buyerId.title: Buyer

sellerId.description: An organization that provides products and services to a buyer. Specifically, the ID of the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) organization receiving the serviceability request.
sellerId.title: Seller

mpoeOnly.description: Indicates if access to the location is currenly Minimum Point Of Entry (MPOE) only. If mpoeOnly is true, this indicates that full access to the location (e.g. sub-unit or suite) has not yet been established. If mpoeOnly is false or not defined, this indicates that full access to the location has been (or will be) established.
mpoeOnly.title: Minimum Point Of Entry Only

expirationDate.description: The date the Serviceability Response expires, formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).
expirationDate.title: Experation Date

serviceSite.description: The service site information for the serviceability request.
serviceSite.title: Service Site

confidence.description: Serviceability confidence from seller for this request.
confidence.title: Serviceability Confidence

installationInterval.description: An estimate of the number of calendar days until the desired service could be activated.
installationInterval.title: Installation Interval

productSpecifications.description: Details of the product specifications and associated pricing (offerings) returned with the response.
productSpecifications.title: Service Details
